mediaLibrary.title: Media Library
mediaLibrary.action.searchResources: Search resources in this media library
mediaLibrary.confirm.title: Confirm
mediaLibrary.confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this media library?
mediaLibrary.confirm.leavePage: This will navigate to the resource page. Do you want to continue?
mediaLibrary.warning.irreversible: Be careful, this operation can not be undone

mediaLibrary.label.pathMarkConfigHint: Next step: Go to Path Mark Config to select files or directories, configure resources, and link them to a media library
mediaLibrary.emptyState.title: No Media Libraries
mediaLibrary.emptyState.description: Create a media library to organize and manage your resources
mediaLibrary.emptyState.feature3: Sync and manage multiple root paths
